name: Pasta Run
description:
You are the Pasta Savior. Collect all the Pasta to save it from overcooking! Be careful not to fall however, you would lose a lot of precious time...

Notes:

  • Map randomization is kinda messy - you may need to play a few times to land on another map (there's a grand total of Two Maps)

Controls:

Left/Right: Horizontal movement
Space bar: Jump
Shift: Sprint

Made with Pengu123 for Ludum Dare 49.
Music by Pengu123, composed specifically for Pasta Run.

Additional credits: 

  • Ivan Skodje for most of the player character code - as seen in this video.
  • Hoel Boedec for their Frequency Generator app - the sound effects has been generated with them.
  • codeman38 for the font DPComic, available here
